news.title: ‘Cruelty that defies belief’ – Gang who beat, burned and tortured woman in Dublin flat were working for major Tallaght criminal
news.summary: A gang who tortured a woman in a Dublin flat for three hours by burning her with a makeshift blow torch and threatening to rape her were working for a major Tallaght crime figure.

news.title: Volcano in Russia's far east starts erupting after earthquake
news.summary: A powerful magnitude 8.8 earthquake off Russia's Far Eastern Kamchatka Peninsula triggered tsunami waves of up to 5 metres (16 feet) and sparked evacuation orders in Hawaii and across the Pacific on Wednesday.

news.title: Dublin Airport advises passengers of possible delays as technical glitch grounds flights and triggers travel chaos across the UK
news.summary: Dublin Airport is advising passengers due to fly this evening that there may be delays due to an ongoing issue in the UK which has seen flights grounded and airspace over London temporarily restricted.

news.title: Heartbroken family of Fermanagh shooting victims assured they are not alone as country ‘shocked to its core’
news.summary: The heartbroken family of Vanessa Whyte (45) and her two children, James (14) and Sara (13), who died in a triple murder-suicide in Fermanagh, have been assured they were not alone in facing the appalling tragedy.

news.title: Mortgage boss given injunction against far-right councillor Gavin Pepper over alleged harassment of family
news.summary: The High Court has granted interim injunctions against a far right Dublin City Councillor restraining him from videoing and besetting the home of the boss of mortgage credit servicing and asset management firm Pepper Finance Corporation (Ireland) Ltd DAC.

news.title: Arrest made after man dies and woman in serious condition following M50 crash
news.summary: A man has been arrested following a fatal road crash on the M50 in the early hours of this morning.

news.title: Israeli minister hints at annexing parts of Gaza as more people die from starvation
news.summary: Israel could threaten to annex parts of Gaza to increase pressure on the militant group Hamas, an Israeli minister said on Wednesday, an idea that would deal a blow to Palestinian hopes of statehood on land Israel now occupies.

news.title: Ask a money coach: ‘My fiance and I are struggling with wedding costs. Is there a polite way to ask for cash gifts?’
Conor McKeon: A Katie Taylor Croke Park fight would be a promotional miracle – that’s your job, Eddie Hearn, not the GAA’s
news.summary: Eddie Hearn is chancing his arm. His latest theory as to why Croke Park is a no-go for Katie Taylor’s last hurrah is, “I just don’t think the people there are massive fans of boxing.”

news.title: The Naked Gun review: Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson are locked, loaded (and dating) but reboot is a misfire
news.summary: Remember the ­Manly Man? Sure you do. There he was, shirt and tie on a Sunday evening, rustling the newspaper impatiently at some sissy on the TV and polluting the room with cigar smoke.
